abstract: Like other note-taking apps out there, Google’s software serves as a digital locker to stash saved web pages, audio clips, photos, text and more.
snippet: Like other note-taking apps out there, Google’s software serves as a digital locker to stash saved web pages, audio clips, photos, text and more.
lead_paragraph: Q. Is Google Keep just for making lists? Is it possible to save web pages I browse on my Android tablet in there, and if so, how?

headline.main: Storing Web Pages, and Much More, in Google Keep
